tool_description: this api gets the conventional banner image for the websites
name: banner-image
title: banner-image

api_list.name: bg
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://banner-image.p.rapidapi.com/bg/banner-image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "banner-image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://banner-image.p.rapidapi.com/bg/banner-image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "banner-image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
